description:
As a regular user,
I want to use the application under an account corresponding to my profile.

As a registered user,
I want to designate my dietician who will then be my coach for the follow-up.

As a registered dietitian,
I want to see all the informations of a person I follow.

As a registered user,
I want to set custom goals within a given time.

As a user,
I want to see the most popular valid diet plans.

As a user,
I want to view the nutrient and calorie attributes of any food.

As a registered dietitian,
I want to convey goals and advice to the users that I follow.

As a registered user,
I want to enter my personal information useful for my follow-up.

As a registered user,
I want to receive regular and personalized offers to improve my health.

As a user,
I want to receive frequent automatic encouragement to motivate me.

As a user,
I want to be recommended a new food that benefits my health every day.

As a user,
I want to be introduced to a new sport and nearby clubs every week.

As a registered user,
I want to be suggested a nutrition program according to my profile and my goals.

As a user,
I want to find the best addresses for dietetics in the region.

As a registered user,
I want to save my meal and activity logs.
